text: Elke Blumauer (born 23 July 1963) is a German handball player who played for the West German national team. She was born in Offenbach am Main. She represented West Germany at the 1984 Summer Olympics in Los Angeles, where the West German team placed fourth. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Hesse Category:German female handball players Category:Olympic handball players of West Germany Category:Handball players at the 1984 Summer Olympics
title: Elke Blumauer
